Package etomica.virial.overlap

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccumulatorVirialOverlapSingleAverage
    Accumulator for taking ratio between two sums (and pretend it's an "average") Data added to this accumulator must be a 2-element DataDoubleArray
    DataProcessorVirialOverlap
    DataProcessor which takes in values for v/pi and pi2/pi (from MeterVirial) and calculates the overlap values for various values of alpha.
    DataSourceVirialOverlap
    Measures ratio of two cluster integrals using overlap sampling.
    DataVirialOverlap
    Convenience class that analyzes data from the reference and target system, providing average and error estimates on values and ratios.
    DataVirialOverlap.FullResult  
    IntegratorOverlap
    This integrator class manages (2) sub-integrators for an overlap sampling simulation.
